title: Remove all authentication and caller checks to enable full guest access

requirements.text: Remove all msg.caller verification logic from every backend function in backend/main.mo so that all functions are publicly accessible without any authentication or authorization checks

quotes: guests should have access to the whole site, no action should be restricted to guests
all backend functions to be publicly accessible with no caller checks or authentication requirements whatsoever

acceptanceCriteria: No function in backend/main.mo contains any msg.caller verification
No function throws unauthorized or authentication-related errors
All functions can be called by anonymous users without any restrictions
Guest users can perform all actions that previously required authentication

requirements.text: Remove the initAccessControl function call and any related access control initialization logic from the backend
acceptanceCriteria: initAccessControl function is not called anywhere in the backend
No access control state is initialized or maintained
Backend does not track or verify user permissions

requirements.text: Remove any remaining authentication-related logic from frontend hooks (useActor.ts) that calls initAccessControl or depends on authentication state for authorization
acceptanceCriteria: useActor.ts does not call initAccessControl when actor is ready
Frontend does not attempt to initialize or manage access control
All backend operations work without any authentication setup

constraints: Maintain all existing functionality - only remove authentication/authorization checks
Do not modify the overall application structure or data models
Preserve all existing features for message management, reactions, media handling, etc.
nonGoals: Modifying the frontend UI or user experience
Changing data structures or storage mechanisms
